alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:29PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central El Paso and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 129 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pinon to near Salt Creek. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Avondale and Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
